name: HotSpringSounds
0:
”Alexa open Hot Spring Sounds”
”Alexa ask Hot Spring Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hot spring sounds
des:
Dive into a serene experience with Hot Spring Sounds, your personal gateway to tranquility and relaxation. This Alexa Skill transports you to the heart of nature's own spa, enveloping you in the calming sounds of gentle waters. Designed for those seeking a moment of peace in their busy lives, Hot Spring Sounds offers a meticulously curated audio escape.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Hot Spring Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
